Summary: Biochemical reaction from metoclopramide to metoclopramide metabolite m5.
Biochemical reaction from metoclopramide to metoclopramide n4-sulfonate.
Biochemical reaction from metoclopramide to des-ethylmetoclopramide. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A4 or CYP2D6.
Biochemical reaction from metoclopramide to metoclopramide o-glucuronide.
